data.Name: Slightly Stoopid
data.Bio: While it’s a rare commodity for a band to tour as consistently as Slightly Stoopid, the group’s diligent commitment to live music provides some insight into their loyal fan base and unique creative metamorphosis throughout their 17-year existence. Though it's been a couple of years since the release of their last studio album, Top Of The World (August 14, 2012), the Ocean Beach, California-based group—led by co-founders and multi-instrumentalists Read more on Last.fm

311 was formed in 1990 in Omaha, Nebraska, United States by singer/guitarist Nick Hexum, singer S.A. Martinez, guitarist Tim Mahoney, drummer Chad Sexton and bassist P-Nut. The band now resides in Los Angeles, California. 311 mix rock, rap, reggae and funk into their own unique sound. After years of consistent touring, 311 have developed a reputation as one of the hardest working, most influential and most entertaining live bands in the U.S. 311 have released ten studio albums Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Michael Franti & Spearhead
data.Subtitle: with Galactic featuring Anjelika Jelly Joesph and Satsang
data.Description:
MICHAEL FRANTI & SPEARHEAD at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on June 5, 2021 has been rescheduled to June 4, 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce MICHAEL FRANTI & SPEARHEAD live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Saturday, June 4th, 2022.
